text: A 23 - year - old man has been charged with the murders of his mother and sister. John Jenkin is due in court over the murders of Alice McMeekin, 58, and Kathryn Jenkin, 20. Both women were found dead at their home in Newton Street, Millom, Cumbria, on Saturday morning, with Mr Jenkin arrested shortly afterwards. Detectives said Ms McMeekin and her daughter were found with head injuries. Although formal identification has not yet taken place, Cumbria police announced the identities of the victims and Mr Jenkin, who has also been charged with animal cruelty after the family dog was found dead at the house. He is due before Furness district magistrates' court today.
title: Man charged with murdering mother and sister in Cumbria.
